title: Male Student –11 x 11 Room in House –Algonquin College –April 1
description:
If this ad is up, it is AVAILABLE. Room is available starting April 1, 2020 . Lease required until August 31, 2020 OR month-to-month (extension possible).

•8 minute walk to bus stop to take 94/95

•5 minute drive to Algonquin College

• Room is on the first floor (not basement)

• Furnished with a bed, table, chair

•All utilities included: heat, hydro, water, wireless Internet

• Kitchen shared with 2 other male students

• Washer and dryer included (no charge)

• Very quiet, good for studying. Not a party house.

Requirements

• Pay first and last month’s rent

• No smokers, no pets, no drugs, no overnight guests

• Lease is minimum until August 31, 2020 or month to month

• Please call or message Mimi at 613-620-0866

• Parking on driveway (1 spot for a regular sized car) is available for $20/month extra ($520/month)

title: Furnished Room at the Byward Market - All inclusive
description:
Cathcart Street (Cathcart and Dalhousie).


Available April 1st 2020, in a Fully Furnished house (4 bedrooms).


The other 3 roomates are a student and two civil servants in their late 20th (two males and a female))


Located in the ByWard Market, 10 minutes’ walk (about 0.8 Km) to Ottawa University classrooms.


The 90 sq/ft room is on the main floor and is fully furnished that includes: a double size bed, closet, desk and Book case.


Included in rent: high-speed internet, hydro, heat and water.


Shared kitchen equipped with microwave, Fridges, stove, utensils, cutlery, dishes, pots, pans, toaster, etc.


Free In unit Laundry


Parking is extra


This accommodation, located at a safe neighbourhood in the ByWard Market, 10 minutes walk from the University of Ottawa (0.8Km), few minutes from the Rideau River parks, very short walk to Ottawa Parliament, grocery stores bars, restaurants and essential amenities.


Please call/text Dan at 613-252-0387

title: CENTRETOWN: May 1st - Nice 3 Room Student Apartment
description:
Great central location for Ottawa University and Carleton University students.


Nice medium sized 3 Room apartment in heritage walk up building. 2 Large rooms and 1 medium room. Gorgeous kitchen with small lounge area, breakfast nook and full bathroom with tub/shower.


Ideal location, close to everything including grocery stores, restaurants, shops of Bank St, Chinatown and Little Italy, and next to all major bus routes.


7 minute walk to the Lyon O-Train station.


Bright and sunny unit with hardwood floors - a clean, quiet and proper living space to focus on your studies.


Nice laundromat around the corner - no laundry in unit or building.


Street parking permits available from City of Ottawa ~$650 annually.


$2250/month + utilities


***Please specify your desired move date and provide your phone number and name to be contacted for a viewing appointment.

description: This is a beautiful 5 bedroom home in a quiet area, very clean and well-maintained. Parking for 3 cars. Two bedrooms are available May 1. Co-op Students are welcome. Four or twelve month lease available. House is perfectly located on a bus route and within walking distance to Algonquin College or Carleton University – 15 min walk. Close to Grocery Stores, Banks, Tim Horton’s, Transportation, Parks, Mooney’s Bay Beach, Canal, Bike paths and other amenities. House features are: fully furnished home, hardwood floors throughout the house, kitchen, living room and dining rooms are on main level, air conditioning, 2 full bathrooms, 5 appliances, plus a large chest freezer in Laundry room, Hydro, water, gas, Bell high speed unlimited internet and Bell TV are included . There is also access to private backyard and BBQ. This is a great place to live – you will not be disappointed! Please contact Gordon Maclean at gordon.maclean1@sympatico.ca or on my cell at 905 407 0361 for further information

Four bedrooms; 2 full bathroms in Elmvale Acres area, very good neighborhood, walking distance to CHEO General Hospital (there is hospital shuttle bus between General Hospital, Civic Hospital, Riverside hospital), near Riverside Hospital, Roger Guindon Hall, University of Ottawa Alta Vista campus (RGN), (U of Ottawa has shuttle bus for students going to/from downtown campus every hour);. Near The Perley and Rideau Veterans Health Centre, Gamma-Dynacare Medical Laboratories, Canadian Forces Health Care Centre, Canadian Medical Association, Canadian Pharmacists Association, Canadian Blood Services, The Conference Board of Canada, Oakpark Retirement Community, Carleton University.

This house 10 is minutes walk to the General Hospital CHEO; (there is hospital shuttle bus between General Hospital, Civic Hospital, Riverside hospital), near Riverside Hospital, Roger Guindon Hall, University of Ottawa Alta Vista campus (RGN), (UofOttawa has shuttle bus for students going to/from downtown campus every hour); Ottawa Hospital has also free shuttle bus goes between General Campus, Riverside campus and Civic campus. Near The Perley and Rideau Veterans Health Centre, Gamma-Dynacare Medical Laboratories, Canadian Forces Health Care Centre, Canadian Medical Association, Canadian Pharmacists Association, Canadian Blood Services, The Conference Board of Canada, Oakpark Retirement Community.


There are 4 bedrooms (2 bathrooms) in this semi-detached house; ONLY rented EXCLUSIVELY to medical students, nurses, medical elective or medical rotation, pharmacy student, healthcare or medical professional; The house (and bedrooms) is fully furnished, fully equipped and provided as: bed, mattress, study desk, study lamp, chair, standing mirror, laundry, laundry detergent, kitchenware, toaster, microwave, oven toaster, fridge, stove, dining tables and chairs, coffee table, utensils, iron, iron board, hygienic paper, bikes, etc. (all you need to bring is your food and personal belongings), unlimited high speed WIFI Internet, laundry on site. Rent is $60/day or $300/week per room/person (shared bathrooms) or $990/month/room/person; rent included all utilities, bed, bedsheets, towels, study desk, chaise, study lamp, laundry, laundry detergent, kitchenware, utensils, iron, iron board, hygienic paper, umbrella, bikes, helmet, etc.; parking available, snow cleared by contractor (if you park at the hospital, it would cost you $14/day or a monthly pass is $90, but the waiting list to get the monthly pass is very long)

title: Room for rent Walkley/Bank * For students*

No visitors allowed with the exception of families. All utilities included. Send me an email for any other information. We ask only $150 as a security deposit.
